Package it.polimi.is23am10.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.is23am10.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClient, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public abstract class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IClient
An abstract class representing the app running in client mode. Holds the three elements needed for proper functioning:
  • Networking: Player Connector
  • Game state: VirtualView
  • UI/UX: UserInterface
See Also:
